author: Daniel Oberhaus
title: America’s Electricity is Safe From the Coronavirus—for Now
description: Utilities and grid operators are well-prepared to handle the pandemic, but a second wave of the virus later this year could be disastrous.
content: Two times each day, New York Power Authority employees file out of the control room at the Niagara Power Plant just a few miles away from the eponymous waterfall. They are replaced by a cleaning crew that disinfects the banks of computer monitors and switch p… [+5962 chars]
